item.title: Pubali Bank holds events in Lalmatia to promote cashless payments
item.description: With the slogan of ‘লেনদেন হচ্ছে ক্যাশলেস, এগিয়ে যাচ্ছে বাংলাদেশ’, Pubali Bank PLC initiated cashless Lalmatia Rally, inauguration of Bangla QR code and exchange of views held on behalf of the bank in Lalmatia, Dhaka with the aim of making the cashless transaction system in Bangladesh
